title: DragonForce ransomware abuses SimpleHelp in MSP supply chain attack
summary: The DragonForce ransomware operation successfully breached a managed service provider and used its SimpleHelp remote monitoring and management (RMM) platform to steal data and deploy encryptors on downstream customers' systems. [...]

title: Iranian pleads guilty to RobbinHood ransomware attacks, faces 30 years
summary: An Iranian national has pleaded guilty to participating in the Robbinhood ransomware operation, which was used to breach the networks, steal data, and encrypt devices of U.S. cities and organizations in an attempt to extort millions of dollars over a five-year span. [...]

title: New Self-Spreading Malware Infects Docker Containers to Mine Dero Cryptocurrency
summary:
Misconfigured Docker API instances have become the target of a new malware campaign that transforms them into a cryptocurrency mining botnet.
The attacks, designed to mine for Dero currency, is notable for its worm-like capabilities to propagate the malware to other exposed Docker instances and rope
